messages:
I test the CHECK_ENTITY_NAME and
SET_ENTITY_NAME actions.
Set my name to 'Mage 00'
and then talk to me again.

Good work, you set my name to '%SELF%'!
Now I should set my name back to 'Mage 01'
when you close this dialog.

I test the CHECK_ENTITY_X and
CHECK_ENTITY_Y actions. Set my
X to 193 and my Y to 97
and then talk to me again.

Good work, you set my X to 193 & my Y to 97!
I should set X back to 192 and Y back to 96
when you close this dialog.

I test the CHECK_ENTITY_INTERACT_SCRIPT and
CHECK_ENTITY_TICK_SCRIPT actions. Set the
tick or interact scripts for yourself to
anything other than their current value.

When you talk to me again, I should know
if you changed them and will say
something new.

Looks like you updated your own
onTick Script or onInteract Script.
They should be reset to their original
values when you close this dialog.

I test the CHECK_ENTITY_PRIMARY_ID,
CHECK_ENTITY_SECONDARY_ID, and
CHECK_ENTITY_PRIMARY_ID_TYPE actions.

Set my primary ID to 12,
my secondary ID to 1,
 and my primary ID type to 3
and then talk to me again.

Good work, you set my primary ID,
secondary ID, and primary ID type.
They should reset to their original values
(13, 0, 2) when you close this dialog.

I test CHECK_ENTITY_CURRENT_ANIMATION
and CHECK_ENTITY_CURRENT_FRAME.
Use your action by pressing RJOY_LEFT,
and I should update my message.

Good work, you used your action, and I
was able to verify that it happened.

Now I will change my animation to test
SET_ENTITY_CURRENT_ANIMATION and
SET_ENTITY_CURRENT_FRAME. I should
Start on the third frame.

I test CHECK_ENTITY_TYPE.
Set your EntityType to `baby_goat`,
and I should update my message.

Good work, you became `baby_goat`, and I
was able to verify that it happened.

Now I will set your EntityType to `mage`
via SET_ENTITY_TYPE.

I test `SET_ENTITY_DIRECTION_TARGET_ENTITY`
Walk around me, I should point at you,
no matter your position!

I test `SET_ENTITY_DIRECTION_RELATIVE`
Walk around me, I should point away from
you, no matter your position!

I test `COPY_SCRIPT`, using onTicks 07 & 08!
Walk around me, I should point at you,
Pause half a second, then look away, 
no matter your position!

I test will `SET_SCREEN_SHAKE` 3 times:
			"frequency": 20,
			"amplitude": 3,
			"duration": 2000

Now:,

			"amplitude": 32,
			"duration": 8000

Now:

3 points first, then back to player!

and they all verified!

I test the action COPY_VARIABLE.
Change my 'path_id' to != 00,
and I will transform into that type,
and confirm that the copy is working!

Hooray! 'path_id' had a value of
$entity_type_id$, which is not 00,
and I set my `primary_id` to that.
Changing back now!

I test the action PLAY_ENTITY_ANIMATION.
First, I will play my walk animation once.
Now, my 'action' animation will play twice.

Now, I will turn into Bender and play the
"Shiny Metal Ass" 'action' animation once,
then turn back into a mage.
